channel.title: Granular Synthesis
channel.description:
Hi Folks!!! I've the Axoloti Board with the controller made by Tom Whitwell. I would like to project **a patch that can modify the sounds with the granular synthesis**.
I have some difficulties and so I ask for your help. Do you have any suggestions? :slight_smile:
Thank you

item.title: Granular Synthesis
item.dc:creator: @marierose marie rose
item.description:
@marierose wrote:

thanks a lot sorry but i don't know how to post the patch....i will try to make a photo of the screen of the computer....
anyway...thanks a lot

Read full topic

item.title: Granular Synthesis
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

This thread might help to get you started with granular synthesis. If you have specific problems, it's good to post a screenshot or you patch file, so people can help you better.

Help with basic concept of granular playback Patching
After putting together a basic synth, i'd like to have a look at wavetables and explore some simple granular playback. I searching and followed a few examples posted and managed to get pretty rough sample/table playback from an SD card. My goal would be to match the functionality of a microgranny 2: http://www.bastl-instruments.com/instruments/microgranny/ ..and then try and take it polyphonic. I'm far from academic, have a good understanding of synthesis, basic understanding of logic thrâ€¦

Read full topic
